column5: great news. Bobby's can be a traffic jam. I miss the old place that burned down. Perfect location.
I hear yeah.used to love going to village corner.
A good breakfast spot there would be nice too. That would be awesome ..Someone could name it Bait and Bacon .. PjShorthorn
I'm moving to VB that's gonna be a boom town,just like the old gold rush days,I'm gonna open a saloon with barmaids galore,the lakes will be slow,but the saloon will be rockin!

So some good news from Vermilion Bay.Clarks bought the old Village Corner property on the corner of Hwy#105 and Hwy#17.They will have all your bait needs there and will be selling fishing licenses also.So what ever route you take you will have opportunities to get your bait at many of their baits shops along your route.
Tell Wayne to have malts n ice cream cones also,some people need others things beside bait!!
Will it be open for this season or just in the works ? PjShorthorn
There's an LC within staggering distance.
GREAT news!!! That corner is an excellent spot for a business & has great potential & is much needed!!! Good luck to them! RBF
May 1 st is the plan.Youll see my wife there PJ.Sounds like she's going to help out there.
Be good to see the corner busy again.
Good to know! A little competition for Bobby’s, hopefully it’ll be easier to get in and out of, Bobby’s can be challenging on Saturday’s.
That's for sure.Getting some major pot holes in there lot.
